Author: ZenGold
Title: ZenGold ICO announcement
Body: ZenGold, a project developed on Metaverse Blockchain, announces its ICO campaign on Friday, May 26, 2017 3:00 PM (GMT+8)!  The ICO will last for 15 days. The closing date is Friday, June 9, 2017 3:00 PM (GMT+8). The total number of 63.000.000 ZGC tokens will be distributed within the campaign.  BTC, ETH, ETC and ETP will be accepted during ICO campaign. The “Early bird” bonuses (up to 20%) will be announced by ZenGold for those contributing at the early stages of ICO.  Those interested can invest via three different channels:    http://zengold.org/ (accepting payments in BTC, ETP and ETH).    www.ico365.com (accepting payments in BTC and ETH).    www.btc9.com/Ico (accepting payments in BTC).   For the further information and whitepaper, please visit ZenGold official webpage: http://zengold.org/

Author: MaxMuze
Title: ZenGold ICO announcement
Body: My Scamy Senses are going off  A Flaky white paper Members who cannot be goggled to see history or experience A road map that starts with an ICO and ends with a Coin distribution and Listing on a exchange...   Is it coincidence that most of your white paper looks like the ViewFin website? http://www.viewfin.com/en/   Also are you saying Li Mingze the VP from View Fin is the CEO of ZenGold...   Can core team confirm who Li Zhen is?  These are the makings of a pump and dump scam in the best case scenario, worst case they take the money and run.  I would advice extreme caution... don't let FOMO get you ripped off.
